flavorText:
"We returned to the field and found poor Len, every detail of his final moment perfectly cast in that awful dust."
—Javad Nasrin, outrider captain

foreignData.flavorText: „Wir kehrten zurück und fanden den armen Len, jedes Detail seines schmerzhaften Ablebens perfekt in diesen schrecklichen Staub gezeichnet."—Javad Nasrin, Vorreiter-Hauptmann
foreignData.name: Völlige Geringschätzung
foreignData.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)Schicke eine Kreatur deiner Wahl mit Stärke 3 oder weniger ins Exil.

foreignData.flavorText: "Regresamos al terreno y allá encontramos al pobre Len. Cada instante de su momento final había quedado esculpido en ese horrible polvo".—Javad Nasrin, capitana de batidores
foreignData.name: Indiferencia absoluta
foreignData.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)Exilia la criatura objetivo con fuerza de 3 o menos.

foreignData.flavorText: « Nous avons retrouvé le pauvre Len. Tous les détails de ses derniers instants étaient parfaitement moulés dans cette horrible poussière. »—Javad Nasrin, capitaine cavalière
foreignData.name: Mépris absolu
foreignData.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)Exilez la créature ciblée de force inférieure ou égale à 3.

foreignData.flavorText: "Tornammo sul campo e trovammo il povero Len, ogni dettaglio dei suoi ultimi istanti impresso chiaramente in quell'orribile polvere."—Javad Nasrin, capitano battipista
foreignData.name: Completo Disinteresse
foreignData.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.)Esilia una creatura bersaglio con forza pari o inferiore a 3.

foreignData.flavorText: 「レンを探しに現場に戻った。あいつの最期の瞬間が、細部にいたるまで塵で象られて残っていた。」――先導隊長、ジャヴァド・ナスリン
foreignData.name: 完全無視
foreignData.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）パワーが３以下のクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを追放する。

foreignData.flavorText: "우리는 전장으로 돌아와 불쌍한 렌을 발견했네. 그 끔찍한 먼지가 그의 마지막 순간을 완벽하게 보존하고 있었어."—선두 기수 대장 자바드 나스린
foreignData.name: 완전한 무시
foreignData.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.)공격력이 3 이하인 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 추방한다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Voltamos para o campo e encontramos o pobre Len, com cada detalhe de seu último momento impresso perfeitamente naquele pó terrível."— Javad Nasrin, capitã vanguardeira
foreignData.name: Negligência Completa
foreignData.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.)Exile a criatura alvo com poder igual ou inferior a 3.

foreignData.flavorText: «Мы вернулись на поле и нашли беднягу Лена. Его последние мгновения были в деталях запечатлены в этом ужасном прахе».— Джавад Назрин, капитан наездников
foreignData.name: Полное Пренебрежение
foreignData.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Изгоните целевое существо с силой 3 или меньше.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我们回到战场，发现了可怜的莱恩，他临终前的动作完美地印刻在那堆可怕的尘土中。」～前导兵队长贾维纳金
foreignData.name: 彻底忽视
foreignData.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）放逐目标力量等于或小于3的生物。

foreignData.flavorText: 「我們回到戰場，發現了可憐的萊恩，他臨終前的動作完美地印刻在那堆可怕的塵土中。」～前導兵隊長賈維納金
foreignData.name: 徹底忽視
foreignData.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）放逐目標力量等於或小於3的生物。

name: Complete Disregard
originalText:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Exile target creature with power 3 or less.

rulings.text: Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.

text:
